product.name: Black Full Sleeves Slim Fit T-Shirt
product.short_description: A perfect fusion of style and comfort, this black T-shirt from Mufti is the ideal choice for you.
product.description:
A perfect fusion of style and comfort, this black T-shirt from Mufti is the ideal choice for you. Crafted from cotton in a slim fit, this T-shirt offers a cozy feel. This T-shirt also features full sleeves and a polo collar for an added appeal. Don this solid T-shirt with a pair of lightly washed jeans and tan loafers.
